description: This file defines an abstract base class 'BaseAPIApp' for creating API applications using FastAPI, with support for agent and team initialization, app configuration, middleware setup, and server management. It includes methods for setting up the app, handling exceptions, and registering the app on a platform.

classes.name: BaseAPIApp
classes.description: An abstract base class for FastAPI-based API applications, managing initialization, configuration, middleware, and server startup.

methods.name: set_app_id
methods.description: Generates and sets a unique application ID if not already set.

methods.name: _set_monitoring
methods.description: Sets the monitoring flag based on environment variable 'AGNO_MONITOR'.

methods.name: get_router
methods.description: Abstract method to retrieve the API router; must be implemented in subclasses.

methods.name: get_async_router
methods.description: Abstract method to retrieve the asynchronous API router; must be implemented in subclasses.

methods.name: get_app
methods.description: Constructs and returns a FastAPI application instance with middleware, exception handlers, and included routers.

methods.name: serve
methods.description: Starts the Uvicorn server with the specified app, host, port, and reload options.

methods.name: register_app_on_platform
methods.description: Registers the application on an external platform, with logging and error handling.

methods.name: to_dict
methods.description: Serializes the app's configuration, including agent and team info, into a dictionary.
